description: InstallScript and InstallScript MSI installations are created using Flexera InstallShield to install software. InstallShield is a program that specializes in the design of customized software installers. When the InstallScript or InstallScript MSI installation is run on a user's computer, an ILG file is automatically created to record and store the procedure.
Procedures recorded in an ILG file are typically one of the following:
NOTE: ILG files can only be created when logging is enabled.

common_filenames.description: Setup.ilg - The common name given to ILG log files.
